entry.title: Handyman
entry.summary: I prefer the technical and repair challenges but am also available for fixit or fiddly around-the-house jobs. Assembling furniture, installing shelves, designing space saver fold-out doodahs, or small building projects. Call someone else for mowing, gardening or deck extensions ... but if you have a…
entry.content:
I prefer the technical and repair challenges but am also available for fixit or fiddly around-the-house jobs. Assembling furniture, installing shelves, designing space saver fold-out doodahs, or small building projects.

Call someone else for mowing, gardening or deck extensions ... but if you have a fiddly job that can be done in a few days or less give me a call.

entry.title: Electrical
entry.summary: cars - vans - boatsI've spent over a year as an apprentice electrician on island, getting used to those invisible electrons and how they work. While you need a licensed electrician for any 240v work, I'm quite able to tackle most of the electrical challenges…
entry.content:
cars - vans - boats

I've spent over a year as an apprentice electrician on island, getting used to those invisible electrons and how they work. While you need a licensed electrician for any 240v work, I'm quite able to tackle most of the electrical challenges in bikes, boats, buggies, vans or e-bikes.

TV systems

I'm gearing up to be able to diagnose and fix faults with your TV setup, from the antenna down.

entry.title: Computers
entry.summary: RepairI've been tinkering with computers for 30 years which gives me a good sense of how to troubleshoot and repair. There's a lot of issues I can address, and if it's beyond me I'll recommend professional services. What issues do you struggle with? Write a…
entry.content:
Repair

I've been tinkering with computers for 30 years which gives me a good sense of how to troubleshoot and repair. There's a lot of issues I can address, and if it's beyond me I'll recommend professional services.

Tuition

What issues do you struggle with? Write a list of what frustrates you, and call me. I recommend one on one tuition sessions, we can straighten out a lot of kinks in an hour. Also see the Tips section for some of my general setup recommendations.

Setup

NBN. Routers. Antivirus. Email. Syncing settings. Password managers. Phones, tablets, laptops, desktops. iOS, Windows, Linux, Android. Copy stuff. Sort out folders. Whatever... give me a call!

Websites

Call me to discuss options.

entry.title: Home
entry.summary: your local tinker Hi I'm Russell - your go-to fixit fella on Coochie. Think of me for computer issues, car/boat/van electrics, and fiddly jobs around the house. Many times at home when a printer is playing up or a computer needs taming or a…
entry.content:
your local tinker

Hi I'm Russell - your go-to fixit fella on Coochie. Think of me for computer issues, car/boat/van electrics, and fiddly jobs around the house.

Many times at home when a printer is playing up or a computer needs taming or a tap needs repair, I hear the magic words "Russell fix?" - and fix it I do. I'm now offering the whole island my troubleshooting, repair and tuition skills. 

If you have run out of patience with Google and haven't had any luck with the grandkids, give me a call - I may be able to help. So far I've managed to ...

  • speed up slow laptops
  • set up various computer/phone/laptop combinations to the delight of owners
  • troubleshoot NBN connection issues
  • rewire a quad bike
  • access and replace a dead car battery (not easy when you can't open the door!)
  • install cheap and simple power window switches in car doors
  • repair and paint rotted timber window frames
  • demolish flyscreens and doors at one house - then install them in the house next door
  • install shelving
  • fix various mowers and whipper snippers

I'm having fun tackling a variety of challenges, and have many happy customers.

Rates:

$40 per hour. It's fixed or it's free.
